original_text: Zedekiah was twenty and one years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Hamutal, the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.
korean_text: 시드기야가 왕이 될 때에 나이가 이십일 세라 예루살렘에서 십일 년간 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 하무달이요 립나인 예레미야의 딸이더라

sentences.original_text: Zedekiah was twenty and one years old
and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem
And his mother's name was Hamutal
